cz.ive.gui
Class DelegatedGraphicInfo

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.gui.DelegatedGraphicInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphicInfo, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class DelegatedGraphicInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphicInfo, java.lang.Cloneable

Implementation of GraphicInfo used only for templates IveObjects. This is only a storage for reference to real GraphicInfo class and to a GraphicTemplate.

Author:
ondra
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

DelegatedGraphicInfo

public DelegatedGraphicInfo(IveObject object,
                            java.lang.String graphicInfoClassName,
                            java.lang.String templateId)
Creates a new instance of DelegatedGraphicInfo. This method affects given IveObject by setting up its GraphicInfo. The first time this instance is used it will transparently create the real Graphic info to do the job.

Parameters:
object - IveObject we should be associted with.
graphicInfoClassName - class of GraphicInfo to be represented
templateId - id of the GraphicTemplate to be represented
Method Detail

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D canvas,
                 Viewpoint view,
                 java.awt.Point offset)
Description copied from interface: GraphicInfo
Draws object on the given canvas using a viewpoint for correct position and scale retrieval. The drawing should be offseted by a given vector.

Specified by:
draw in interface GraphicInfo
Parameters:
canvas - graphical canvas where to draw the object
view - graphical viewpoint associted with the calling GUI
offset - drawing offset

getBoundingBox

public java.awt.Rectangle getBoundingBox(Viewpoint view,
                                         java.awt.Point offset)
Description copied from interface: GraphicInfo
Retrieves bounding box of this object in given Viewpoint. The bounding box should be offseted by a give vector.

Specified by:
getBoundingBox in interface GraphicInfo
Parameters:
view - Graphical viewpoint associated with the calling GUI
offset - bounding box offset.
Returns:
rectangular bounding box of this object

getObjectAtPosition

public IveObject getObjectAtPosition(Viewpoint view,
                                     java.awt.Point offset,
                                     java.awt.Point p)
Description copied from interface: GraphicInfo
Retrieves object at the given position. This is either associated object or one of its slaves.

Specified by:
getObjectAtPosition in interface GraphicInfo
Parameters:
view - Graphical viewpoint associated with the calling GUI
offset - bounding box offset.
p - the position we are interested in.
Returns:
object at the given position.

instantiate

public GraphicInfo instantiate()
Create the real GraphicInfo. To do the job. This call also affects IveObject for which this instance was created by setting its GraphicInfo to the newly created one. This method creates new instance of Graphic info only for the first time. It returns the same instance, if called again (which should not occur).

Returns:
instance of GraphicInfo that was represented by this storage only object.

clone

public DelegatedGraphicInfo clone(IveObject obj)
Clones this instance and assocites it with given IveObject. Given IveObject IS NOT altered in any way. Setting of GraphicInfo for given IveObject is expected in clone/instantiate/whatevercalled method in IveObject class.

Parameters:
obj - copy of IveObject to be associated with

clone

protected DelegatedGraphicInfo clone()
Overrides:
clone in class java.lang.Object
